title: Cosimo Matassa Made His Reputation Behind The Studio Glass
teaser: Cosimo Matassa recorded songs by Fats Domino, Little Richard, Professor Longhair and Jerry Lee Lewis and helped get the New Orleans sound out to the world. Matassa died Thursday at the age of 88.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
